name: Rising Water
description:
A party of plucky heroes come together through the power of friendship to defeat their final foe.

Note: Controllers ARE supported.

Controls:

Arrow Keys / Left Stick: Move

WASD / D-Pad: Switch characters

X Key / Space / A (Xbox): Jump

C Key / X (Xbox): Attack

Z Key / Shift / B (Xbox) / Bumpers / Triggers: Dodge

Each character has an attack and a down attack, and Olly's got an aerial attack too.

Tips: 

  • Use Maggie's Down Attack, "Healing Touch", as much as possible!
  • Keke can have two bombs out at a time. Trying to place a third will make the first explode prematurely.
  • Ollie's Down Attack is the strongest move in the game, but has very short range. Use it wisely!
